TextView.android:text: \nLet's get started. Wakey Wakey has 3 cool features that you can enable for each alarm:
If you snooze your alarm, Wakey Wakey will text your selected contacts.
Listen to what is making world headlines today through our radio!
Rather than hitting an off button, shake your phone to turn off the alarm.
This screen is the alarm hub, which displays all of your alarms. Here, you can click on any alarm to quickly view and edit its settings.\n\nMake your first alarm by hitting the button below.
